plot outline: Garry (Sarwar Ahuja), brought up in Canada, has recurring dreams of places around Patiala city in Punjab, despite having never visited it. When he chances upon Reet (Madalsa Sharma), a girl from Patiala, Garry seeks her help to uncover the meaning behind his unusual dreams. Reet, along with her friends, travels to India for this purpose and uncovers some shocking truths.
title: Patiala Dreamz
plot: Garry (Sarwar Ahuja), brought up in Canada, has recurring dreams of places around Patiala city in Punjab, despite having never visited it. Reet, along with her friends, travels to India for this purpose and uncovers some shocking truths.
